title: Microsoft Authenticator on Android is FIPS 140 compliant for Entra authentication
description:
General Availability - Authenticator on Android is FIPS 140 compliant 
 
 
 eginning with version 6.2408.5807 , Microsoft Authenticator for Android is compliant with Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS 140-3) for all Microsoft Entra authentications, including phishing-resistant device-bound passkeys, push multi-factor authentication (MFA), passwordless phone sign-in (PSI) and time-based one-time passcodes (TOTP). No changes in configuration are required in Microsoft Authenticator or Microsoft Entra ID Admin Portal to enable this capability. Microsoft Authenticator on iOS is already FIPS 140 compliant, as announced last year.
